original_text: The path went all around the yard and it covered the space between the gates. It was called the lower path.
korean_text: 그 박석 깔린 땅의 위치는 각 문간의 좌우편인데 그 너비가 문간 길이와 같으니 이는 아래 박석 땅이며

sentences.original_text: The path went all around the yard
sentences.korean_translation: 그 길은 뜰 전체를 둘러싸고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and it covered the space between the gates
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 문들 사이의 공간을 덮었습니다

sentences.original_text: It was called the lower path
